column6: "THE WIDOW" PART 1 (OF 4) She's back! You asked for it; you got it: Daredevil's fiery, redheaded ex-partner returns to Hell's Kitchen to help the new Kingpin keep the streets clean. But why is she really back? Guest-starring Nick Fury and the Avengers!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | colorist:Matt Hollingsworth | penciller (cover):Alex Maleev
